data.prayer: Father, help your children in Altay, Russia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Altay, Russia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Altay, Russia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Altay, Russia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 37,859 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Chelkans people.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Altay, Russia.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Altay, Russia humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.section_summary:
the state of Altay, Russia has a population of 2,587,000.

We estimate Altay has 37,859 people who might know Jesus, 1,452,037 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,097,104 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 37,859 believers in Altay to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.
